trans-unit.source: Select Company
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Change Company - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Name field. If pressed, opens the selected company.
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Change Company - Control Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Display Name field
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Change Company - Control Display Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Company Information Badge Management
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Name field
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Company Badge Style
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control System Indicator Style - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Dark Blue,Light Blue,Dark Green,Light Green,Dark Yellow,Light Yellow,Red,Orange,Deep Purple,Bright Purple
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control System Indicator Style - Property OptionCaption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want to apply a certain style to the Company Badge. Having different styles on badges can make it easier to recognize the company that you are currently working with.
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control System Indicator Style - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Company Badge Text
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control System Indicator Text - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies text that you want to use in the Company Badge. Only the first 4 characters will be shown in the badge.
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - Control System Indicator Text - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: The Company Badge settings have changed. Refresh the browser (Ctrl+F5) to update the badge.
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Company Badge - NamedType CompanyBadgeRefreshPageTxt

trans-unit.source: Kill Sessions

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the User ID field

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Login Datetime field

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Client Type field

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Client Computer Name field

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Server Instance ID field
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Kill Session - Control Server Instance ID - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Server Instance Name field
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Kill Session - Control Server Instance Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Database Name field
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Kill Session - Control Database Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Kill Session
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Kill Session - Action Kill - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Kill selected session
trans-unit.note: Page DEV Kill Session - Action Kill - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: %1 killed your current session.
trans-unit.note: %1 User Id
Page DEV Kill Session - Action Kill - Method OnAction - NamedType KillLbl

trans-unit.source: Delete All Data

trans-unit.source: Delete all table records
trans-unit.note: Page DEV View Table - Action Delete - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: All records from %1 will be deleted. Continue?
trans-unit.note: %1 = Table Name
Page DEV View Table - Action Delete - Method OnAction - NamedType DeleteRecordsQst
